trends: There have been 116 other sightings in Dallas
There were no other sightings in Dallas on or around September 6th 2011
Summary: Stationary, pulsating object observed from kitchen window, before object disappeared.
divs: Sighting DetailsI live in Dallas, and was rinsing a cup out in my kitchen sink when I happened to look out the window next to me and see a bright, pulsating light situated on the horizon between my neighbors' roof and a patch of trees. The light was stationary, but did not appear to be a planet, as the colors frequently changed from yellow gold, to pink, to red and orange. There may have been two smaller lights flashing at different times, actually. It was difficult to see exactly what I was looking at given the distance of myself from the object. Anyway, I observed it for around three minutes with no change aside from it's weird flashing. I felt no fear, just a kind of awe and confusion over what it was. In this time, I saw two planes fly by and matched them to both (definitely neither). After that, I went back to the living room and was on the computer for maybe fifteen minutes, before I decided to check the window again and see if the object was still there. When I checked again, it was gone. I still don't know what to make of it, since I've never observed an object like that that low in the sky and flashing like it did.
